message.name: ERR_XRV_PORTAL_ACC_EXISTS_FOR_EXTERNAL_PARTY
message.locale: The client specified has already been associated with a Citizen Workspace account.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CW_ACC_ALREADY_LINKED_TO_REMOTE_SYSTEM
message.locale: The citizen account with username %1s has already been associated to the system %2s.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_CITIZEN_PORTAL_ID
message.locale: Citizen Workspace username is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_EXTERNAL_PARTY_ID
message.locale: External Party ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_EXTERNAL_SYSTEM_ID
message.locale: External System ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_CREATED_BY_USER
message.locale: Created By User is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_NO_TARGET_SYSTEM_FOR_ASSOCIATION
message.locale: No active Target System named %1s found in the system.

message.name: ERR_NO_REMOTE_SYSTEM_FOR_ASSOCIATION
message.locale: No active Remote System with an associated Target System named %1s found.

message.name: ERR_SYSTEM_ID_CANNOT_BE_CORE_CURAM
message.locale: Cannot associate accounts to remote systems named "CORE_CURAM" as this is an internal value used to represent the internal Curam system.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_EXTERNAL_SYSTEM_TYPE
message.locale: External System Type is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_INTERNAL_CURAM_SYSTEM_TYPES_MUST_BE_CORE_CURAM
message.locale: If the external system type is Internal Curam, the value must be CORE_CURAM.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_NOT_VALID
message.locale: Username %1s is not a valid citizen workspace username.

message.name: ERR_TARGET_SYSTEM_NOT_VALID
message.locale: No active remote system exists with a name of %1s.

message.name: ERR_NOT_A_LINKED_USER
message.locale: User with username %1s is not a Linked user.

message.name: ERR_ACCOUNT_NOT_LINKED_TO_REMOTE_SYSTEM
message.locale: The account with username %1s is not linked to the remote system %2s.

message.name: ERR_ACCOUNT_NOT_LINKED_TO_CURAM
message.locale: The account with username %1s is not linked to the Curam eligibility system.

message.name: ERR_NOT_A_VALID_CONCERNROLE
message.locale: Cannot link account with username %1s to Curam as the value passed in is not a valid concernRoleID
